credit_line: Gift of Charles Savage Homer, Jr.
title: Summer Afternoon
provenance: Gift of Charles Savage Homer, Jr.
medium: Brush and oil paint on canvas
description: Horizontal view of a young woman in white flounce dress standing in center; leaning against a hammock swung from supports beyond the right and left edges of picture; resting her arms on farther edges of hammock and looking down.  A fan hangs from a cord around her right wrist.
name: Painting
